entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@marcorubio Marco I have one for you:

US has a population of 4.4% of the total global population yet we carry 25% of the total global covid-19 infection rate & that would be higher except for our inept ability to test properly.

& we carry 25% of the global prison population.

Access please
